attributes.title: Ultimate Buggy Racing Championship
attributes.description: 8-week tournament featuring the best buggy racers competing across 8 unique zones for the championship title. Test your skills, strategy, and consistency in this demanding racing series.
attributes.prizes: üèÜ 1st Place: 180,000 TBUX + Special Buggy + Swag | ü•à 2nd Place: 90,000 TBUX + Swag | ü•â 3rd Place: 45,000 TBUX + Swag | üèÖ Finalists: 20,000 TBUX + Swag
attributes.rules:
**Tournament Rules:**

1. **Race Format**: Weekly races with point-based scoring system
2. **Points Distribution**: 1st (10pts), 2nd (9pts), 3rd (8pts), 4th (7pts), 5th (6pts), 6th (5pts), 7th (4pts), 8th (3pts), 9th+ (1pt)
3. **Zone Rotation**: Each week features a different zone with unique challenges
4. **Sportsmanship**: Respectful conduct required at all times
5. **Technical Issues**: Race results may be reviewed for fairness
6. **Participation**: Minimum 4 races required to qualify for final standings
7. **Tiebreakers**: Head-to-head results, then best finishing positions
attributes.registration_info:
**How to Join:**

‚Ä¢ Registration opens: October 1st, 2025
‚Ä¢ Requirements: Valid racing license, approved buggy
‚Ä¢ Entry fee: 5,000 TBUX
‚Ä¢ Contact tournament admins to register
‚Ä¢ All participants must attend mandatory briefing on October 15th
attributes.contact_info:
**Tournament Administration:**

‚Ä¢ Head Organizer: RaceMaster
‚Ä¢ Technical Support: SpeedDemon
‚Ä¢ Rules Questions: TurboJudge
‚Ä¢ Emergency Contact: discord.gg/ultimateracing

attributes.name: Zone 1 - Starting Circuit
attributes.description: A challenging introductory course with sweeping turns and technical sections. Perfect for setting the tone of the championship.

attributes.name: Zone 2 - Technical Twists
attributes.description: Tight hairpin turns and elevation changes test precision and control. Only the most skilled racers can master this course.

attributes.name: Zone 3 - Speed Straight
attributes.description: High-speed straights and gentle curves where top speed and drafting skills are paramount.

attributes.name: Zone 4 - Urban Challenge
attributes.description: Navigating tight city corners and avoiding urban obstacles in this technical street circuit.

attributes.name: Zone 5 - Water Hazard
attributes.description: Wet conditions and slippery surfaces around the coastal route test handling and control.

attributes.name: Zone 6 - Mountain Climb
attributes.description: Steep gradients and hairpin mountain passes challenge power and braking techniques.

attributes.name: Zone 7 - Forest Run
attributes.description: Narrow forest paths and unpredictable terrain require precision and adaptability.

attributes.name: Zone 8 - Championship Chase
attributes.description: The ultimate test of skill, nerve, and strategy. Every mistake could be championship-ending.
